title: Better Than Boris (with Katy Clark MSP)
itunes:title: Better Than Boris (with Katy Clark MSP)
description:
Scottish Labour MSP Katy Clark tells us Scotland's more cautious approach to re-opening the economy has been better than England's, but more clarity is needed over the rules.

Plus: we take a deep-dive into the issue of teachers' pay. Luke Sibieta from the Institute for Fiscal Studies says average wages are now 8% lower in real terms than they were in 2007.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Plus: we take a deep-dive into the issue of teachers' pay. Luke Sibieta from the Institute for Fiscal Studies says average wages are now 8% lower in real terms than they were in 2007.
